mapper.sql: id, store_id, product_id, batch_id, batch_update_time, amount, quality_period, sale_period, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE store_product_batch_history
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
batch_id = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch_update_time = #{batchUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
quality_period = #{qualityPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_period = #{salePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
